>" Nothing comes easy, and I'm aware of that. I'm not here to take the eas=
y way out. I said I'd do anything it took to restore my leader, and I am wi=
lling to stand by my pledge, no matter the cost to my own spark. So if it m=
eans comming dangerously close to my own mortality, I accept the challenge.=
 I am willing to fight anyone who wishes to challenge me, and I pledge to f=
ight in Warrior's honor." 
>
>He waits to find out who will take him up on =
his offer.

"Autobot" Scourge's dark=A0tones move across the room as he wat=
ches Tuscon with=A0narrow and dangerous optics,=A0"You stand in the middle =
of=A0Hydras'=A0throne, sneaking in here=A0like a tubo-rat,=A0attacking from=
 the back, and you ask us for honor?" 

Cyclonus nodded, "You ask for what =
you yourself are not ready to give." Cyclonus stepped foward, his optics gl=
owing, his hands dropping to his sides and a deceptivly relaxed 'ready stan=
ce', "Yet if it is a battle you desire, then you shall have it."

"NO!" Rod=
imus' voice barked out as he stepped foward, his optics bright and his weap=
on ready! "It is me he came for, and it is *I* who will give him this battl=
e."

Cyclonus glanced back at Rodimus, the slightest hint of annoyance sket=
ching itself across his face for a moment. 

"Let the boy take him" Scourge=
 said as he stepped nearer to Cyclonus, a sly smile appearing on his face, =
"It will lets us know what he's made of."

Cyclonus paused for a moment and=
 then nodded, gesturing for Rodimus to step foward. "He is yours."

Rodimus=
, after a slightly=A0worried=A0glance at Scourge and then Cyclonus, as if h=
e was only just now realizing something, stepped foward to face his new opp=
onant. 

"I shall give you all the honor you have given us *Autobot!*" He s=
aid, That last word comming out almost as a curse. With all thoughts of any=
 confusion on his part lost in his readiness for battle the=A0Dark Rodimus=
=A0gestured to Tuscon, "Come, come to your doom!"

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclonus=
/Scourge/Dark Rodimus)
